file.content:
<template>
  <BaseStepContainer
    step="accounts_workflows"
    :title="stepTitle"
    :can-go-back="true"
    :can-go-next="true"
    :can-proceed="canProceed"
    :next-button-text="nextButtonText"
    @next="handleNext"
    @previous="handlePrevious"
  >
    <component
      :is="currentSubstepComponent"
      :platform-trigger="data?.platformTrigger"
      :platform-targets="data?.platformTargets"
      :trigger-connection="data?.triggerConnection"
      :connected-target-accounts="data?.connectedTargetAccounts"
      :current-target-index="currentTargetIndex"
      :total-targets="data?.platformTargets?.length || 0"
      :workflow-created="data?.workflowCreated"
      @update="handleUpdate"
      @next="handleNext"
      @previous="handlePrevious"
    />
  </BaseStepContainer>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed, defineAsyncComponent } from 'vue';
import { useOnboardingFlow, isDynamicTargetStep, getTargetIndexFromSubstep } from '@composables/useOnboardingFlow';
import { isSubstepComplete } from '@/types/onboarding';
import BaseStepContainer from '../BaseStepContainer.vue';

const { currentSubstep, data, next, previous, update } = useOnboardingFlow();

const currentTargetIndex = computed(() => {
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    return getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
  }
  return data.value?.currentTargetIndex || 0;
});

const stepTitle = computed(() => {
  const titles: Record<string, string> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: 'Connect & Automate',
    post_from_here_to_here: 'Choose Your Automation Flow',
    connect_trigger_account: 'Connect Source Account',
    connect_target_accounts: 'Connect Target Account',
    generate_workflow: 'Generate Workflow',
    // customize_conditions_options_schedule: 'Customize Your Workflow',
    activate_workflow_and_test: 'Activate & Test'
  };

  // Handle dynamic target connection steps
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    const targetIndex = getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
    const totalTargets = data.value?.platformTargets?.length || 0;
    return `Connect Target Account ${targetIndex + 1} of ${totalTargets}`;
  }

  return titles[currentSubstep.value] || 'Accounts & Workflows';
});

const canProceed = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'accounts_workflow_start') return true;
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'customize_conditions_options_schedule') return true; // Optional
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return true; // Optional

  return isSubstepComplete(currentSubstep.value, data.value);
});

const nextButtonText = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return 'Continue to Completion';
  return 'Next';
});

const currentSubstepComponent = computed(() => {
  const componentMap: Record<string, any> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./AccountsWorkflowStart.vue')),
    post_from_here_to_here: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./PostFromHereToHere.vue')),
    connect_trigger_account: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTriggerAccount.vue')),
    connect_target_accounts: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTargetAccounts.vue')),
    generate_workflow: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./GenerateWorkflow.vue')),
    // customize_conditions_options_schedule: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./CustomizeConditionsOptionsSchedule.vue')),
    activate_workflow_and_test: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ActivateWorkflowAndTest.vue'))
  };

  // Handle dynamic target connection steps
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    return defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTargetAccounts.vue'));
  }

  return componentMap[currentSubstep.value] || null;
});

const handleNext = () => next();
const handlePrevious = () => previous();
const handleUpdate = (updates: any) => update(updates);

defineEmits<{
  next: [];
  previous: [];
  update: [updates: any];
}>();
</script>

Created `/Users/natedamstra/socialaize/src/constants/workflowRecommendations.ts` with:

**Types:**
- `WorkflowActionType` - All 22 workflow actions from the schema
- `PlatformType` - All 9 supported platforms  
- `WorkflowRecommendation` - Single recommendation (description + action)
- `TargetPlatformRecommendations` & `WorkflowRecommendations` - Nested structure

- 7 trigger platforms × 8 target platforms = 56 combinations
- Each with 1-3 tailored recommendations based on:
  - Platform differences (titles for YouTube, professional tone for LinkedIn)

  - Format adaptation (short-form to long-form, casual to professional)

**Helper Functions:**
- `getWorkflowRecommendations(trigger, target)` - Get specific combo
- `getAllTargetRecommendations(trigger)` - Get all targets for trigger
- `hasRecommendations(trigger, target)` - Check existence

toolUseResult.originalFile:
<template>
  <BaseStepContainer
    step="accounts_workflows"
    :title="stepTitle"
    :can-go-back="true"
    :can-go-next="true"
    :can-proceed="canProceed"
    :next-button-text="nextButtonText"
    @next="handleNext"
    @previous="handlePrevious"
  >
    <component
      :is="currentSubstepComponent"
      :platform-trigger="data?.platformTrigger"
      :platform-targets="data?.platformTargets"
      :trigger-connection="data?.triggerConnection"
      :connected-target-accounts="data?.connectedTargetAccounts"
      :current-target-index="currentTargetIndex"
      :total-targets="data?.platformTargets?.length || 0"
      :workflow-created="data?.workflowCreated"
      @update="handleUpdate"
      @next="handleNext"
      @previous="handlePrevious"
    />
  </BaseStepContainer>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed, defineAsyncComponent } from 'vue';
import { useOnboardingFlow, isDynamicTargetStep, getTargetIndexFromSubstep } from '@composables/useOnboardingFlow';
import { isSubstepComplete } from '@/types/onboarding';
import BaseStepContainer from '../BaseStepContainer.vue';

const { currentSubstep, data, next, previous, update } = useOnboardingFlow();

const currentTargetIndex = computed(() => {
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    return getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
  }
  return data.value?.currentTargetIndex || 0;
});

const stepTitle = computed(() => {
  const titles: Record<string, string> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: 'Connect & Automate',
    post_from_here_to_here: 'Choose Your Automation Flow',
    connect_trigger_account: 'Connect Source Account',
    connect_target_accounts: 'Connect Target Account',
    generate_workflow: 'Generate Workflow',
    // customize_conditions_options_schedule: 'Customize Your Workflow',
    activate_workflow_and_test: 'Activate & Test'
  };

  // Handle dynamic target connection steps
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    const targetIndex = getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
    const totalTargets = data.value?.platformTargets?.length || 0;
    return `Connect Target Account ${targetIndex + 1} of ${totalTargets}`;
  }

  return titles[currentSubstep.value] || 'Accounts & Workflows';
});

const canProceed = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'accounts_workflow_start') return true;
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'customize_conditions_options_schedule') return true; // Optional
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return true; // Optional

  return isSubstepComplete(currentSubstep.value, data.value);
});

const nextButtonText = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return 'Continue to Completion';
  return 'Next';
});

const currentSubstepComponent = computed(() => {
  const componentMap: Record<string, any> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./AccountsWorkflowStart.vue')),
    post_from_here_to_here: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./PostFromHereToHere.vue')),
    connect_trigger_account: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTriggerAccount.vue')),

import { useOnboardingFlow, isDynamicTargetStep, getTargetIndexFromSubstep } from '@composables/useOnboardingFlow';
import { isSubstepComplete } from '@/types/onboarding';
import BaseStepContainer from '../BaseStepContainer.vue';

const { currentSubstep, data, next, previous, update } = useOnboardingFlow();

const currentTargetIndex = computed(() => {
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    return getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
  }
  return data.value?.currentTargetIndex || 0;
});

const stepTitle = computed(() => {
  const titles: Record<string, string> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: 'Connect & Automate',
    post_from_here_to_here: 'Choose Your Automation Flow',
    connect_trigger_account: 'Connect Source Account',
    connect_target_accounts: 'Connect Target Account',
    generate_workflow: 'Generate Workflow',
    ai_workflow_enhancements: 'AI Workflow Enhancements',
    platform_customizations: 'Platform Customizations',

  };

  // Handle dynamic target connection steps
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    const targetIndex = getTargetIndexFromSubstep(currentSubstep.value);
    const totalTargets = data.value?.platformTargets?.length || 0;
    return `Connect Target Account ${targetIndex + 1} of ${totalTargets}`;
  }

  return titles[currentSubstep.value] || 'Accounts & Workflows';
});

const canProceed = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'accounts_workflow_start') return true;
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'customize_conditions_options_schedule') return true; // Optional
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return true; // Optional

  return isSubstepComplete(currentSubstep.value, data.value);
});

const nextButtonText = computed(() => {
  if (currentSubstep.value === 'activate_workflow_and_test') return 'Continue to Completion';
  return 'Next';
});

const currentSubstepComponent = computed(() => {
  const componentMap: Record<string, any> = {
    accounts_workflow_start: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./AccountsWorkflowStart.vue')),
    post_from_here_to_here: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./PostFromHereToHere.vue')),
    connect_trigger_account: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTriggerAccount.vue')),
    connect_target_accounts: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTargetAccounts.vue')),
    generate_workflow: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./GenerateWorkflow.vue')),
    // customize_conditions_options_schedule: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./CustomizeConditionsOptionsSchedule.vue')),
    activate_workflow_and_test: defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ActivateWorkflowAndTest.vue'))
  };

  // Handle dynamic target connection steps
  if (isDynamicTargetStep(currentSubstep.value)) {
    return defineAsyncComponent(() => import('./ConnectTargetAccounts.vue'));
  }

  return componentMap[currentSubstep.value] || null;
});

const handleNext = () => next();
const handlePrevious = () => previous();
const handleUpdate = (updates: any) => update(updates);

defineEmits<{
  next: [];
  previous: [];
  update: [updates: any];
}>();
</script>

content.text:
Done! I've successfully added two new substeps after `generate_workflow` in the onboarding flow. Here's what was implemented:

## Changes Made:

### 1. **Updated `/src/types/onboarding.ts`**:
   - Added `ai_workflow_enhancements` and `platform_customizations` to the `accounts_workflows` substeps array
   - Added field mappings for both steps (both check `workflowCreated`)
   - Updated `generateDynamicSubsteps()` to insert `generate_workflow` before `ai_workflow_enhancements`

### 2. **Updated `AccountsWorkflowContainer.vue`**:
   - Added titles: "AI Workflow Enhancements" and "Platform Customizations"
   - Added component mappings for both new substeps
   - Set both steps as optional (can proceed without completion)

### 3. **Created `AIWorkflowEnhancements.vue`**:
   - Uses `BaseSubStep` wrapper
   - Loads `WorkflowEditor` with the existing `workflowId` from onboarding data
   - Shows purple-themed info banner about AI enhancements
   - Includes back/continue navigation buttons

### 4. **Created `PlatformCustomizations.vue`**:
   - Uses `BaseSubStep` wrapper  
   - Loads `WorkflowEditor` with the existing `workflowId` from onboarding data
   - Shows blue-themed info banner about platform customizations
   - Includes back/continue navigation buttons

## Flow Order:
1. `generate_workflow` (creates the workflow)
2. `ai_workflow_enhancements` ← **NEW** (loads same workflow)
3. `platform_customizations` ← **NEW** (loads same workflow)
4. `activate_workflow_and_test`

Both new steps are **optional** and load the same `WorkflowEditor` component with the workflow that was just generated. Ready for you to explain how you want to proceed with these steps! 🎯
